long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WebTasker is a powerful yet intuitive Chrome extension designed to boost your productivity by seamlessly integrating task management into your browsing experience. 

With WebTasker, you can create and manage unique to-do lists for each website you visit, allowing you to organize your tasks in a context-specific manner.

Simple and Efficient Task Management: Add, complete, and delete tasks with just a few clicks. The user-friendly interface allows you to quickly capture ideas and action items as you browse.

Your tasks are automatically saved and synced across your Chrome browser, ensuring your lists are always up-to-date and accessible whenever you need them.

Privacy-Focused: All your task data is stored locally in your browser, ensuring your personal information remains private and secure.
